description: Gets details about the maintenance configuration of a table. For more information, see S3 Tables maintenance in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace associated with the table.

nested_items.name: tableARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Details about the maintenance configuration for the table bucket.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the maintenance configuration.

nested_items.name: icebergCompaction
nested_items.description: Contains details about the Iceberg compaction settings for the table.

nested_items.name: targetFileSizeMB
nested_items.description: The target file size for the table in MB.

nested_items.name: strategy
nested_items.description: The compaction strategy to use for the table. This determines how files are selected and combined during compaction operations.

nested_items.name: icebergSnapshotManagement
nested_items.description: Contains details about the Iceberg snapshot management settings for the table.

nested_items.name: minSnapshotsToKeep
nested_items.description: The minimum number of snapshots to keep.

nested_items.name: maxSnapshotAgeHours
nested_items.description: The maximum age of a snapshot before it can be expired.
